name: user-management-system
description: User Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install concurrently pm2 rimraf --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json .angular/cache
scripts.build:frontend: npm run clean:frontend && cd frontend && npm cache clean --force && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run install:angular && npm run build -- --configuration production
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
